title: Introduction to C Programming
description: Lay the foundation of programming with C. Explore variables, loops, functions, and memory management. Develop problem-solving skills and build a strong programming mindset. Ideal for beginners.

title: Introduction to Algorithms
description: Delve into the fundamental concepts of algorithm design and analysis. Learn to solve complex problems efficiently, understand algorithmic, and apply them to real-world computing challenges.

title: Introduction to C++ for DSA
description: Introduction to C++ for DSA is a comprehensive course that lays the foundation for data structures and algorithms in C++. Learn the language basics, memory management.

title: Basic Data Structures
description: Unlock the power of data organization with our 'Basic Data Structures' course. Learn the fundamentals of arrays, linked lists, stacks, and queues, and harness their efficiency in solving real-world problems.

title: Introduction to OOP Python
description: Explore the foundational principles of Object-Oriented Programming (OOP) in Python. Learn to create classes, objects, and inheritance, enabling you to build modular and maintainable Python.

title: Software Engineering
description: Software Engineering is the systematic approach to designing, developing, and maintaining software systems. It encompasses principles, methodologies, and best practices for software creation.

title: AWS, Cloud Computing
description: Explore the world of AWS and cloud computing. Learn to deploy scalable applications, manage cloud resources, and harness the power of AWS services for efficient and cost-effective solutions.

title: Database (MySQL)
description: Master the art of database management with MySQL. Learn to design, optimize, and query databases efficiently. Build scalable and robust data-driven applications with this essential database technology.

title: Problem-Solving Part
description: In the Problem-Solving Part of this course, you'll sharpen your critical thinking and analytical skills. Tackle complex coding challenges, and debugging techniques to become a proficient problem solver.
